src:
Meski Sempat Berseteru, Mane Akui Senang Main Bareng Salah
05 Nov 2019, 22:53 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sadio Mane mengakui ia memang sempat berseteru dengan Mohamed Salah namun menegaskan tetap merasa senang bisa bermain dengan pemain Mesir itu.
Mane dan Salah musim lalu tampil kompak di Liverpool. Mereka sama-sama menjadi top skor Premier League.
Namun di awal musim ini sempat timbul keretakan hubungan di antara keduanya. Semua berawal dari laga lawan Burnley.
Saat itu Mane menjadi sangat emosi usai ditarik keluar oleh Jurgen Klopp. Ternyata ia merasa kesal karena Salah tak memberikannya umpan meski dalam posisi lebih baik untuk mencetak gol.
text:
Although Had Encountered, Mane Admits Happy Playing With Wrong
05 Nov 2019, 22:53 by Bola.net
Bola.net - Sadio Mane admitted he was at odds with Mohamed Salah but insisted he was happy to be able to play with the Egyptian player.
Mane and Salah last season appeared compact at Liverpool. They are both Premier League top scores.
But at the beginning of this season there had been a rift between the two relationships. It all started with the match against Burnley.
At that time Mane became very emotional after being pulled out by Jurgen Klopp. Apparently he was upset because Salah did not give him a bait even though in a better position to score goals.
